page.title: 03Walberton School _ Parents
page.content: One of the great strengths of Walberton Primary School is the close involvement in the school of many parents. There is a thriving PTA which organizes social functions and raises funds (Â£1200+ last year) for such items as PE equipt., TVs, computers, stage lights, swimming pool, projectors, music centres, etc. In addition dozens of parents come in every week for such varied tasks as teaching French; listening to readers; taking groups for cooking, music and games; running after school clubs for chess and computers; helping with school outings and swimming lessons; running a bookshop; looking after the library; etc. All this not only helps the children to have a broader, richer school life but also gives the parents a better view of the pros and cons of school.
